fut_spi_001.vision_name: Return to The Table - Full Alignment
fut_spi_001.current_lie: Separation from The Table, loss of connection, spiritual emptiness, misalignment.
fut_spi_001.future_truth: Full return to The Table. Complete connection. Spiritual fulfillment. Perfect alignment.
fut_spi_001.transformation_path: Gradual reconnection, truth integration, spiritual healing, community support, full alignment.
fut_spi_001.impact_on_table: Full alignment with The Table. Complete connection. Perfect service.
fut_spi_001.impact_on_community: Community fully aligned. Complete unity. Perfect harmony.
fut_spi_001.impact_on_individuals: Individuals fully connected. Complete fulfillment. Perfect alignment.
fut_spi_001.impact_on_systems: Systems fully aligned. Complete truth. Perfect stewardship.
